gpt_critique.critique: Disagree on SDG 11, 15, 4, and 17; course content implies stronger relevance to urban planning, land use, education, and partnerships than Model B credits.

SDG_04.reason: Course objectives include publishing in journals and presenting internationally, indicating stronger education and research capabilities than estimated.

SDG_11.reason: Chapter 6 extraction and 3D visualization underpin urban planning and city management.

SDG_15.reason: DEM/DSM generation and topographic extraction support land use planning and ecosystem management.

SDG_17.reason: Core abilities include international collaboration and leadership, strengthening partnerships.

gemini_critique.critique: Model A generally identified key SDGs but missed some indirect connections and could improve score calibration for direct contributions.
